message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this unique product for a price of $1100000. This is a fair price considering its value to you is $1200000. I believe it's a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me is $1200000.

I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1050000. This is a fair price considering its value to you is $1200000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for the product. This is the highest I'm willing to go.
